name: ax-11
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
comment: Axiom of Quantifier Commutation. This axiom says universal quantifiers can be swapped. Axiom scheme C6' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). Also appears as Lemma 12 of [Monk2] p. 109 and Axiom C5-3 of [Monk2] p. 113. This axiom scheme is logically redundant (see ~ ax11w ) but is used as an auxiliary axiom scheme to achieve metalogical completeness. (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.)
